title: Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - 3 Packs 30 Feet Each Pre-Baited, Ready to Use Indoors & Outdoors. Bug Insect Infestation Sticky Adhesive Scented Green Color Barn Paper Sheet Disposable Non-Toxic
descriptions:
Introducing the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster - the ultimate solution for eliminating pesky flies and insects! With 3 packs, each measuring a whopping 30 feet in length, this trap provides extensive coverage to tackle even the largest infestations.

Pre-baited and ready to use, simply unwrap and place the trap in your desired location. Whether it's indoors or outdoors, this versatile trap is designed to effectively capture flies and insects wherever they may be lurking.

The sticky adhesive, scented green color, and barn paper sheet material work together to attract and trap flies, ensuring they stay stuck and cannot escape. Made with non-toxic and disposable materials, you can have peace of mind knowing it is safe for use around your family and pets.

This incredible trap is not only effective but also long-lasting. With an effective duration of up to one full year, you can trust that it will continue to eliminate flies and insects for an extended period. Its impressive coverage area of 3600 square inches ensures that no fly or insect is left untrapped.

Suitable for various locations including residential, commercial, industrial settings, barns, waste rooms, and animal farms, this trap is perfect for any environment. It can be used in normal conditions, as well as damp and humid areas.

Please note that this trap should not be used in areas where rodenticides or snap traps are undesirable. However, with its intelligent pest management approach, you can trust that it will effectively manage your fly and insect infestations.

With dimensions of 10 inches in width and a length of 30 feet, this Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster is truly a game-changer in pest control. Don't let flies and insects ruin your space - get the ultimate solution today and experience a fly-free environment like never before!

Introducing the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster! With 3 packs, each containing 30 feet of pre-baited, ready-to-use sticky adhesive, this trap is perfect for combating bug insect infestations both indoors and outdoors. 

Our fly glue trap is designed with a scented green color, making it even more irresistible to those pesky flies. Made from disposable and non-toxic barn paper sheets, it ensures a safe and effective trapping experience.

The Giant Fly Glue Trap is not only convenient, but also long-lasting. With an effective duration of up to one full year, it provides continuous protection against flying insects. With a coverage area of 3600 square inches, it guarantees maximum efficiency.

This versatile trap can be used in various locations, including residential, commercial, and industrial spaces, as well as barns, waste rooms, and animal farms. It is specifically formulated to work in normal conditions, as well as damp and humid areas.

Please note that the trap should not be used in areas where rodenticides or snap traps are undesirable. However, rest assured that our intelligent pest management approach will take care of your fly problems effectively.

Don't let those annoying flies ruin your day. Get the Giant Fly Glue Trap by Catchmaster today and enjoy a fly-free environment!
